trans-unit.source: Converts WSDL-based policies and contracts about message encoding into descriptions of the binding elements that can implement these policies for the service.
trans-unit.target: 将基于 WSDL 的策略和消息编码协定转换为能够实现这些服务策略的绑定元素说明。

trans-unit.source: Override this class to extend the standard mapping between WSDL and a message encoding binding element.
trans-unit.target: 重写该类可以扩展 WSDL 和消息编码绑定元素之间的标准映射。

trans-unit.source: Then attach your custom object to a `WsdlImporter` either programmatically or by using an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 然后，通过编程方式或使用应用程序配置文件，将您的自定义对象附加到 `WsdlImporter`。

trans-unit.source: You can also attach your custom object to the internal `WsdlImporter` used by the [Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/service-trace-viewer-tool-svctraceviewer-exe.md) using an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以将自定义对象附加到内部`WsdlImporter`由[服务跟踪查看器工具 (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/service-trace-viewer-tool-svctraceviewer-exe.md)使用应用程序配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElementImporter.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IWsdlImportExtension%23BeforeImport%2A> method to directly modify the metadata that is then imported into message encoding binding elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElementImporter.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IWsdlImportExtension%23BeforeImport%2A> 方法可以直接修改随后导入到消息编码绑定元素中的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElementImporter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElementImporter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter" /> that imports the metadata information.
trans-unit.target: 可导入元数据信息的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext" /> object that contains the policy assertions that can be imported and the collections of binding elements to which custom binding elements that implement the encoding policy can be added.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext" /> 对象，其中既包含可以导入的策略断言，也包含可向其添加实现编码策略的自定义绑定元素的绑定元素集合。

trans-unit.source: Defines a method that can import custom policy assertions for message encoding and that adds the binding elements that implement the policy.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个方法，该方法可导入消息编码的自定义策略断言，并添加实现策略的绑定元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="importer" /> or <paramref name="policyContext" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="importer" /> 或 <paramref name="policyContext" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection" /> that describes the services.
trans-unit.target: 描述服务的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> that contains the schema for the <c>wsdlDocuments</c>.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <c>wsdlDocuments</c> 的架构的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> that contains the policy elements.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> 类型的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" />，其中包含策略元素。

trans-unit.source: Called prior to importing the metadata documents associated with the encoding.
trans-unit.target: 在导入与编码关联的元数据文档之前调用。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to inspect, modify and interpret the policy and WSDL before the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElementImporter> does the import.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法用于在 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElementImporter> 执行导入之前检查、修改和解释策略和 WSDL。

trans-unit.source: The contract importer.
trans-unit.target: 协定导入程序。

trans-unit.source: The import context.
trans-unit.target: 导入上下文。

trans-unit.source: Called when importing a contract.
trans-unit.target: 导入协定时调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter" /> that imports the WSDL extensions.
trans-unit.target: 用于导入 WSDL 扩展的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext" /> that provides the context for the mapping.
trans-unit.target: 为映射提供上下文的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Maps the custom WSDL extensions for encoding messages to the service description.
trans-unit.target: 将消息编码的自定义 WSDL 扩展映射到服务说明。
